title: Babbar Ka Tabbar
overview: Babbar Ka Tabbar is a ZEE5 Original web series starring Manu Rishi, Ayesha Raza, Bhavin Bhanushali, Avneet Kaur and Anshuman Jha. The story revolves around the Babbar family, who struggle to bridge the generation gap with their millennial kids. The parents and kids try their best to cope up with each other's lifestyles which often gets them in hilarious situations.
